document.description: ... under 7 who say the best thing about eating at a fast food restaurant is ... Total sales of kids meals at U.S. fast food ... Condiments; Cookies; Cooking; Corn; Coupons; Cutlery; Delicacies
document.body:
Food : Fast Food Find:
Percentage of U.S. kids under 7 who say the best thing about eating at a fast food restaurant is the food: 16%
Source: USA Today, 8/13/2010
Percentage of U.S. kids under 7 who say the best thing about eating at a fast food restaurant is getting a toy: 36% According to the NPD Group. Source: USA Today, 8/13/2010
Total sales of kids meals at U.S. fast food restaurants in 2009: $5.5 billion According to the NPD Group. Source: USA Today, 8/13/2010
First memorial service at a Waffle House: April 2003 In April 2003, a memorial service for Lawrence Clark was held at a Waffle House outside of Gainesville, Georgia that Clark ate at every morning. Forty people attended the service, while Clark's ashes lay in an urn on the hood of a car in the parking lot. Source: Atlanta Journal Constitution, 3/7/2009
